entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or drizzle changing to periods of rain or snow in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
